name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: There are rumors that NFL legend Peyton Manning may run for Senate. Experts say there's no way that mixing the NFL and politics could possibly go wrong.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The winner of the Alabama Senate primary, Roy Moore, once equated homosexuality to having sex with a cow. Moore went on to say, "However, I also have some criticisms of it."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump says his new tax plan would greatly simplify the U.S. tax code. It would divide everyone into two brackets: "taxpayers" and "President Trump."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: It's been reported that morale is low among the Taliban. You know things are bad when THEY are too depressed to go to work.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Khlo√© Kardashian is reportedly pregnant. Khloe said she doesn't care if it's a boy or a girl just as long as it has over one million Instagram followers.
